price: ߞߎߛߎ߲߫ ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߣߐ߬ߓߊ߮ ߢߍߕߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߛߎ߬ߟߊ߫
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
